title: Crashed League client while opening Hextech Box

embed.description: Twitch is the world's leading video platform and community for gamers. More than 45 million gamers gather every month on Twitch to broadcast, watch and chat about gaming. Twitch's video platform is the backbone of both live and on-demand distribution for the entire video game ecosystem.

body:
in the video it shows that i'm openign a hextech box, and the client crashes. (look at 35+ min)
i then relog, and see the box is gone, the key is gone, and i haven't received anything out of the hextech box

replies.body:
I took a look into this and it looks like you received A Superior Prototype Icon and 150 orange essence from this chest.

The crash was likely from a drop in the client's connection to our servers. As a result, I'd recommend ensuring all of your local network settings are compatible with our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.
